The Great Separation

The Defining Moment of Modern History

Event Classification: Historical Catastrophe
Date: October 13, 1307 - Present
Impact Level: Civilization-Altering

⚠️ HISTORICAL TRUTH WARNING

The following information contradicts established historical narratives and reveals the true cause of the modern world's structure. This knowledge explains why supernatural and mundane worlds exist in parallel but separate realities. Understanding the Great Separation is essential for comprehending current supernatural politics and human-supernatural relations.

The Division of Worlds

The Great Separation represents the most significant event in human history - the moment when the supernatural and mundane worlds diverged into parallel but separate realities. What began as a coordinated suppression of the Knights Templar became a complete restructuring of how reality itself operates for humanity.

Core Understanding

Before 1307, supernatural and mundane existed in the same reality. Humans regularly interacted with supernatural beings, magic was practiced openly in many regions, and the cosmic hierarchy was commonly understood. The Great Separation changed this forever.

What Actually Happened

Contrary to historical records, the suppression of the Knights Templar on October 13, 1307, was not primarily about heresy or political power. The Templars had discovered the true nature of the cosmic hierarchy and were attempting to establish humanity as a recognized power within it. Their actions threatened the carefully maintained balance that kept supernatural forces from overwhelming human civilization.

The Supernatural Response

Multiple Tier 3 and Tier 4 entities, recognizing the existential threat that empowered humanity posed, coordinated the most extensive reality manipulation in recorded history. Rather than destroy humanity, they chose separation - creating parallel dimensional layers where humans could exist in ignorance while supernatural forces operated in shadow.

Key Principles of Separation

  • Dimensional Layering: Creation of the Supernatural Overlay dimension
  • Cognitive Barriers: Mental blocks preventing most humans from perceiving supernatural activity
  • Reality Anchoring: Stabilization of mundane reality against supernatural influence
  • Historical Revision: Mass alteration of human records and memories

Related Entries

  • Cosmic Hierarchy - The power structure that necessitated separation
  • Sanctuary Forces - Modern guardians of the separation
  • Discovery Incidents - When separation fails
  • Knights Templar - The catalyst organization

The Templar Discovery

The Jerusalem Excavation (1119-1127)

The true purpose of the Knights Templar's presence at the Temple Mount was not protecting pilgrims, but conducting archaeological excavations. In 1127, they discovered a chamber containing Primordial artifacts and texts that revealed the true nature of reality's hierarchical structure.

What They Found

  • The Hierarchy Codex: Complete documentation of cosmic power structures
  • Binding Protocols: Methods for constraining higher-tier entities
  • Dimensional Maps: Charts showing how to access parallel reality layers
  • The Human Potential Scroll: Evidence that humans could ascend the hierarchy

The Templar Plan (1127-1307)

Armed with this knowledge, the Templars spent 180 years developing a comprehensive strategy to elevate humanity's position in the cosmic hierarchy. Their plan was ambitious and ultimately threatening to established supernatural powers:

Phase 1: Knowledge Consolidation (1127-1200)

The Templars used their discoveries to understand supernatural forces and establish contact with various entities. They learned to use binding protocols and began accumulating power through strategic alliances and careful manipulation of supernatural politics.

Phase 2: Network Expansion (1200-1270)

The Order expanded across Europe, establishing chapters that served dual purposes as both military outposts and research facilities. They began recruiting individuals with supernatural abilities and developed the first human-led organizations capable of challenging Tier 5 entities.

Phase 3: The Ascension Attempt (1270-1307)

The Templars' final phase involved attempting to collectively ascend humanity to Tier 6 status within the cosmic hierarchy. They planned to use a massive ritual powered by accumulated artifacts and the faith of their members to fundamentally alter humanity's relationship to reality.

The Supernatural Coalition

By 1300, supernatural powers had recognized the existential threat the Templars represented. A unprecedented coalition formed between entities that had been enemies for millennia:

The Original Family

Led the vampire response, fearing that human ascension would challenge their authority over their turned children. Mikael personally coordinated with other Tier 3 entities.

The Fae Courts

Both Summer and Winter Courts set aside their eternal conflict to prevent human elevation, which would have disrupted the careful balance of seasonal magic.

Elder Dragons

The remaining Elder Dragons emerged from centuries of isolation to participate, recognizing that human ascension could lead to challenges against their regional domains.

Demonic Hierarchies

Even the usually fractious demon lords coordinated their efforts, understanding that human empowerment would make soul collection and corruption significantly more difficult.

⚠️ The Point of No Return

By October 1307, the Templars had begun their ascension ritual. The supernatural coalition had mere days to act before the ritual's completion would have fundamentally altered reality. What followed was not just the destruction of an organization, but the restructuring of existence itself.

Timeline of the Great Separation

October 13, 1307 - Day Zero

Dawn: King Philip IV of France, acting on supernatural coalition instructions, orders the simultaneous arrest of all Templars across France.

Noon: The Templar ascension ritual begins despite the arrests, powered by pre-positioned artifacts and sympathizers across Europe.

Sunset: The supernatural coalition initiates the Great Working - a coordinated reality manipulation involving over 100 Tier 3 and Tier 4 entities.

Midnight: The first dimensional split occurs. Reality begins separating into parallel layers.

October 14-20, 1307 - The Seven Days

Day 1: Cognitive barriers begin manifesting. Humans start losing the ability to perceive ongoing supernatural activity.

Day 3: Dimensional anchors activate across Europe. Physical reality stabilizes in favor of mundane natural laws.

Day 5: Mass memory modification begins. Human recollections of supernatural events start fading or being recontextualized.

Day 7: The Templar ascension ritual finally fails as the separation becomes complete. The remaining Templars find themselves cut off from their power sources.

1307-1314 - Consolidation Period

The supernatural coalition works to solidify the separation while publicly maintaining the persecution of Templars as cover. Jacques de Molay's execution in 1314 marks the end of organized human resistance to the new reality structure.

1314-1400 - The Dark Century

Humanity adapts to the separated reality. The Black Death (1347-1351) is actually a supernatural enforcement action to prevent emerging human resistance movements. Art, literature, and philosophy shift dramatically as humans subconsciously sense the loss of the supernatural world.

1400-1600 - Renaissance Adaptation

Human creativity explodes as unconscious minds attempt to reconnect with the lost supernatural reality. The Renaissance represents humanity's psychological adaptation to separation, channeling supernatural yearning into art, science, and exploration.

1600-1800 - Scientific Revolution

Cut off from magic, humans develop scientific methodology as an alternative path to understanding reality. The supernatural coalition encourages this development as it further anchors mundane reality and reduces the likelihood of breakthrough discoveries.

1800-1847 - Early Industrial Period

Technological advancement accelerates. Some supernatural entities begin to worry that human technology might eventually breach the separation barriers. The first proto-Sanctuary organizations form in secret.

1847 - The Edinburgh Incident

Dr. Elisabet Thorne's research team accidentally breaches the dimensional separation. This event leads to the formal establishment of the Sanctuary as a organization dedicated to maintaining the separation while protecting human interests.

1847-Present - Modern Era

The current period of managed separation, where the Sanctuary works to maintain the balance between worlds while supernatural forces continue to operate in shadow. Periodic breaches occur, but are contained through increasingly sophisticated protocols.

Consequences of Separation

Immediate Effects (1307-1400)

Human Psychological Impact

  • Collective Trauma: Mass unconscious loss of connection to the supernatural
  • Compensatory Behaviors: Increased focus on material world and physical achievements
  • Religious Intensification: Desperate attempts to reconnect with transcendent reality
  • Artistic Expression: Sublimation of supernatural longing into creative works

Supernatural World Changes

  • Hidden Operations: All supernatural activity forced into shadow
  • Internal Politics: Increased focus on inter-supernatural conflicts
  • Resource Competition: Limited access to human-derived energy and worship
  • Power Concentration: Stronger entities consolidated control over territory and resources

Long-term Societal Changes

Scientific Development

Cut off from magical solutions, humans developed scientific methodology much faster than would have occurred naturally. This acceleration was encouraged by supernatural forces as it further anchored mundane reality.

  • Rapid advancement in physics, chemistry, and mathematics
  • Development of technology to replace magical solutions
  • Creation of materialist worldview that reinforces separation
  • Unintended development of technologies that can affect supernatural entities

Religious Evolution

Human spiritual practices adapted to fill the void left by lost supernatural connection. This led to significant changes in religious expression and organization.

  • Increased emphasis on faith over direct experience
  • Development of more abstract theological concepts
  • Rise of mystical traditions attempting to breach separation
  • Institutional religions becoming more powerful as intermediaries

Cultural Expression

Art, literature, and culture became vehicles for expressing unconscious supernatural awareness. Many cultural developments can be traced to separation effects.

  • Gothic architecture as sublimated supernatural yearning
  • Fairy tales and folklore as encoded supernatural memories
  • Horror genres expressing fear of the hidden supernatural world
  • Science fiction as a safe way to explore impossible realities

Unintended Consequences

⚠️ The Technology Problem

The supernatural coalition's encouragement of scientific development has backfired. Modern human technology can now detect and affect supernatural entities in ways that threaten the separation itself. This is driving current supernatural politics and may force a new Great Working.

Collective Unconscious Power

With 8+ billion humans now existing in separated reality, their collective unconscious has become a force that can influence supernatural events. This was not anticipated by the original coalition.

Breakthrough Individuals

Some humans are born with natural resistance to separation barriers. These individuals can perceive supernatural activity and sometimes develop abilities that allow interaction across dimensional layers.

Reality Stability Issues

Maintaining the separation requires constant energy expenditure from high-tier supernatural entities. This is beginning to strain their resources and may not be sustainable indefinitely.

Cross-Dimensional Bleed

Perfect separation has proven impossible. Supernatural energy occasionally "bleeds" into mundane reality, causing unexplained phenomena that threaten to expose the hidden world.

Current Reality Structure

The Two-World System

Modern reality operates as two overlapping but separate dimensional layers, each with its own rules and inhabitants. Understanding this structure is crucial for comprehending how supernatural and mundane worlds coexist.

Mundane Reality Layer

Primary Inhabitants: Baseline humans (Tier 7)

Governing Laws: Standard physics, natural laws

Characteristics:

  • Stable physical laws with no exceptions
  • No direct supernatural perception or interaction
  • Technology operates normally and predictably
  • Historical records maintain official narratives
  • Cognitive barriers prevent supernatural awareness

Supernatural Overlay Layer

Primary Inhabitants: All supernatural entities (Tiers 3-6)

Governing Laws: Expanded physics allowing supernatural phenomena

Characteristics:

  • Magic and supernatural abilities function normally
  • Can observe and influence mundane layer
  • Hidden from mundane perception except during breaches
  • Maintains true historical records
  • Complex supernatural politics and territories

Interaction Protocols

One-Way Observation

Supernatural entities can observe mundane reality, but mundane humans cannot perceive supernatural activity unless specific conditions are met. This asymmetry is maintained through cognitive barriers embedded in the separation.

Limited Influence

Supernatural entities can affect mundane reality, but such actions require additional energy and risk exposure. Most supernatural influence is subtle and indirect to avoid detection.

Breach Conditions

Under certain circumstances, the separation can be temporarily breached:

  • Extreme emotional states in sensitive individuals
  • Proximity to dimensional weak points
  • Direct supernatural intervention in mundane affairs
  • Technological interference with reality anchors
  • Mass belief events that stress the separation

Maintenance Systems

Reality Anchors

Supernatural devices placed at key locations worldwide that maintain the stability of mundane reality. These anchors prevent supernatural energy from spontaneously manifesting in the mundane layer.

  • Located at major population centers
  • Powered by collective unconscious energy
  • Maintained by supernatural coalition members
  • Vulnerable to technological interference

Cognitive Barriers

Mental conditioning that prevents most humans from perceiving or remembering supernatural events. These barriers are self-reinforcing and become stronger with exposure to mundane-only environments.

  • Implemented through dimensional resonance
  • Weakest in individuals with supernatural heritage
  • Can be overcome through training or trauma
  • Reinforced by social consensus reality

The Sanctuary's Role

While originally not part of the separation structure, the Sanctuary now serves as a crucial maintenance organization, protecting both worlds from dangerous breaches.

  • Monitors for separation failures
  • Contains supernatural breaches
  • Manages aware humans
  • Negotiates with supernatural entities
  • Develops counter-technologies

Current Stress Points

Information Age Challenges

Global communication and surveillance networks make it increasingly difficult to contain supernatural incidents without detection. Social media and citizen journalism pose particular risks to maintaining separation.

Scientific Advancement

Human scientific instruments are becoming sophisticated enough to detect supernatural energy signatures. Quantum physics research is particularly dangerous as it approaches the theoretical frameworks that govern dimensional separation.

Population Growth

The sheer number of humans (8+ billion) is straining the cognitive barrier systems. The collective unconscious effect is growing stronger and may eventually overcome separation protocols.

Entity Resource Depletion

Maintaining the separation requires continuous energy expenditure from high-tier supernatural entities. After 700+ years, some coalition members are beginning to question whether the effort is sustainable.

Future of the Separation

Current Trajectory Analysis

The Great Separation is not a permanent solution. Multiple factors suggest that the current two-world system is approaching a critical juncture that may require fundamental restructuring or complete collapse.

Technological Singularity Threat

Timeline: 2030-2050

Risk Level: Existential

Advanced AI and quantum computing may develop the capability to detect and map supernatural dimensional layers. Once technology can reliably interact with supernatural forces, the separation becomes unsustainable.

Collective Consciousness Threshold

Timeline: 2040-2060

Risk Level: Critical

As human population approaches 10 billion, the collective unconscious may reach sufficient strength to spontaneously breach cognitive barriers. Mass supernatural awareness could occur without warning.

Coalition Resource Depletion

Timeline: 2100-2200

Risk Level: Moderate

Maintaining separation requires enormous energy expenditure. Some coalition members are already reducing their commitment, leading to localized separation failures.

Generational Breakthrough Increase

Timeline: Ongoing

Risk Level: Escalating

Each generation produces more individuals with natural resistance to cognitive barriers. These "Aware" humans are becoming increasingly numerous and organized.

Potential Future Scenarios

Scenario 1: Managed Revelation

Probability: 35%

Description: The Sanctuary and supernatural coalition work together to gradually reveal supernatural reality to humanity over 50-100 years. This controlled process would attempt to prevent chaos while establishing new coexistence protocols.

Challenges:

  • Requires unprecedented cooperation between former enemies
  • Risk of panic and social collapse during transition
  • Need to establish new authority structures acceptable to all parties
  • Managing human desire for revenge against supernatural entities

Scenario 2: Catastrophic Breach

Probability: 40%

Description: The separation fails suddenly due to technological breakthrough, mass belief event, or coalition collapse. Supernatural reality becomes immediately visible to all humans simultaneously.

Consequences:

  • Global panic and social system collapse
  • Immediate human-supernatural conflicts
  • Potential extinction-level events
  • Complete restructuring of civilization

Scenario 3: New Great Working

Probability: 20%

Description: Supernatural coalition attempts a second Great Working to reinforce or modify the separation. This could involve more aggressive reality manipulation or even temporal revision.

Implications:

  • Potential erasure of current human technological advancement
  • Risk of temporal paradoxes and reality instabilities
  • Possible elevation of separation to permanent universal law
  • Complete separation of dimensional layers

Scenario 4: Human Ascension

Probability: 5%

Description: Humanity collectively achieves sufficient technological or consciousness advancement to force recognition as equals within the cosmic hierarchy, similar to the original Templar plan.

Requirements:

  • Technological capability to independently affect supernatural entities
  • Unified global human government or coordination system
  • Understanding of cosmic hierarchy sufficient to challenge it
  • Ability to survive supernatural retaliation

Preparation Strategies

Sanctuary Initiatives

  • Development of technology capable of maintaining localized separation
  • Training programs for potential Aware individuals
  • Diplomatic outreach to moderate supernatural factions
  • Contingency protocols for major breach events

Supernatural Coalition Response

  • Resource conservation and efficiency improvements
  • Development of alternative coexistence models
  • Preparation for potential new Great Working
  • Integration of human technology into supernatural operations

The Choice Ahead

The Great Separation was a response to crisis, not a permanent solution. Within the next century, humanity and supernatural forces will face a fundamental choice: find a new way to coexist as equals, or risk mutual destruction in the failure of the current system. The decisions made in the coming decades will determine the fate of both worlds.
